Today's #refugeecrisis is a dramatic stress test of our community. That's what the last European Council was about. #EPlenary #EUCO
Everyone's a critic - very few defend Europe's good name. But refugees come because our community is still most open & tolerant of all
Solidarity requires mutual understanding, respect. It is our common obligation to assist refugees & to protect EU's external borders
All have to respect commonly agreed rules (Dublin, quotas). Observing rules will always mean sacrificing part of our interests
We have to count mainly on ourselves. Our neighbours have bigger problems. Some use refugees for dirty business or political bargaining chip
A potential victory of Assad's regime, more likely today with support of Russia & Iran, will result in next migratory wave
Restoration of control of external borders is precondition of effective, humanitarian, safe migratory policy
In addition to solidarity, we need responsibility and common sense. Europe without external borders equals Europe without Schengen
Quite long queue of political machos to replace mainstream leaders if not able to guarantee security & order for their community
I and the cabinet has given the mandate and trust given to Dato 'Sri Mustapa Mohamed to negotiate the terms of the Agreement TPPA (1/2)
Tgjwb krjn is to ensure Long-term economic interests of the country are preserved and on the same page, no domestic interest compromised (2/2)
